page.description: Reopen the queries in a session.
page.discussion: The <TBL>.QUERIES_REOPEN() method closes, and then reopens, the table's .MPX files. These are the queries that have been run for the table. This is useful when a query has been run in a different session but with the same table, and you want to bring the current session into synch with the other session.

section.title: Example
section.description: This script is attached to a button on a form. When the button is pressed, the form's queries reflect queries that were run by another instance of that form.
